content.subtitle: North Korea Tried to Sell Nuclear-Weapon Material Last Year — WSJ

paragraphs.name: ee3d
paragraphs.text: No Trump fan by a long shot, but really, what’s the alternative with N. Korea… just let ’em keep on building and testing more nukes and ICBM’s until they finally figure out how to get it ‘right’? And that’s before we even get to their ability to sell and distribute the same nasty tech to other ‘bad actors’?!

paragraphs.name: 086b
paragraphs.text: “What else to do with N. Korea” is a practical question that has nuthin’ to do with Trumpster ‘nationalists’ (or their nihilistic and airy-fairy “Progressive” equivalents, the Peace & Justice Warriors). And funny how out of “10,000 alternatives and more”, I still don’t recall you mentioning even a one?
